note:
Retired TSgt USAF, transgender, gamer both online and TTRPG
I support the WGA

A little background, I spent 5 years in the AF in construction then got an indoor job. The next 15 years I was a programmer. Most of my time was spent in testing with a 4 year stint as a VMS and Unix administrator at a military gaming center in Germany. I've been trained in Cobol, Fortran, C, shell scripting, and SQL.
